buck up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to become happier, or to make someone happier
buck up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Come on, buck up, things aren’t that bad!
You need something to buck you up.
buck up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to tell someone to hurry up
buck up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Buck up, John! We’ll be late.
buck up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to improve, or to make something improve
buck up.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: It’ll be a long time before the situation starts to buck up.
a company that is looking to buck up its networking capabilities
buck up.translation[0].definitions[3].de: used to tell someone to improve their behaviour or attitude
